channel.title: On Sale – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Erectus LSO Back Support Brace
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Are you suffering from lower back pain? The Erectus provides coverage from the sacral spine to the L5 vertebra, granting improved spinal stabilization and reduced strain. Equipped with rigid anterior & posterior removable panels. The mechanical advantage system utilizes bi-lateral tension straps, allowing a 6:1 pull ratio & giving positive patient compliance.

  • Reduces strain on discs
  • Diverts weight bearing forces to the lumbar spine area
  • Manages pain for improved quality of life

The post Erectus LSO Back Support Brace appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Waist Size
32″ – 40″ Small & Medium
40″ – 48″ Large & XL
48″ – 56″ 2XL & 3XL

The post Erectus LSO Back Support Brace appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: AT- Surgical Premium Quality Reusable Washable Incontinence Underpads for Children or Adults
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Pressure redistributing cushion designed to assist in the prevention, treatment and management of pressure ulcers Viscous gel bladder is encased in a fire retardant polyurethane…

The post AT- Surgical Premium Quality Reusable Washable Incontinence Underpads for Children or Adults appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Pressure redistributing cushion designed to assist in the prevention, treatment and management of pressure ulcers
Viscous gel bladder is encased in a fire retardant polyurethane foam shell and provides optimal pressure redistribution, support and comfort
Top of cover is a urethane-coated nylon that is low-shear, vapor permeable and water-resistant. Fire Retardant polyurethane foam shell
Base of cover is waterproof vinyl for durability.Product Dimensions: 18″(L) x 16″(W) x 3″(H). Weight Capacity-Up to 20 inch 275 pounds. 22 inch and up 500 pounds
Removable and replaceable cover has water resistant “Top” and “Non-Slip” vinyl base.
Overall Product Height- 3 inches, Overall Product Length- 18 inches, Overall Product Width- 16 inches, Primary Product Material- Foam.This chair cushion convoluted foam allows passage of air and relief of pressure for long term use

Features:

  • Soft, wick-away material
  • Heavy-duty soaker
  • Uni-shield bearer
  • Seat pad has ties to attach it securely to chair, easy to fix or remove, high resilience.
  • Suitable for kitchen, dining/living room, patio, garden, office, coffee shop and so on.
  • encased in a fire retardant polyurethane foam shell
  • provides optimal pressure redistribution, support and comfort
  • cushion convoluted foam allows passage of air and relief of pressure for long term use

Specifications:

  • Condition: A brand-new, unused, unopened, undamaged item
  • Material:Outer fabric:Polyester, Filling:Sponge
  • Long Term Usable
  • Product DImensions: ‘16X18’

    • Sizes

  • Sizes Available
  • 18 X 20

item.title: Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The No Varix Sports Training Graduated Compression Arm Sleeves deliver performance enhancing compression to the front and back of the arms to increase blood circulation and provide muscle support during athletic training and recovery. The sleeves feature seamless gradient compression which provides wide ribbing in the front for bicep support and tight ribbing in the back and lower arm for triceps and forearm support.

The post Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The compression sleeve fabric is breathable and moisture wicking, allowing the garment and athlete to stay cool, dry and light during exertion. Developed by a professional athletic trainer, the compression leg sleeves are ideal for runners, cyclists, triathletes, and anyone else who is on their feet and would like to increase the blood flow to their arms.

  • Specially designed for increased muscle support during sports training for enhanced athletic performance.
  • Use for cycling, basketball, softball, baseball, football, soccer, volleyball, running, rugby, and other high intensity sports training.
  • A great choice for sports activities, travel or everyday use. Use on long flights to reduce uncomfortable leg and ankle swelling, cramping and minor variscosities
  • Pulls moisture from your skin, dries quickly and helps regulates skin temperature. Moisture-wicking fabric helps keep you cool, dry and ready for all-day action.

  • Learn more about the benefits of compression.

The post Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: No Varix Athletic Compression Socks
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The No Varix Sports Training Graduated Compression Socks will leave you cool, dry, comfortable and ready for action. Get in the game faster and stay at your peak longer. Specially designed for increased muscle support during sports training for enhanced athletic performance.Wick unwanted moisture away from the skin to the surface where it can be easily evaporated. The reinforced shape and arch work with the cushioned sole to provide extra leg support, increasing circulation and performance.

The post No Varix Athletic Compression Socks appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Graduated ribbed compression gives you maximum support where you need it, and lighter compression where you don’t – resulting in a more comfortable fit. Lighter compression on the calves gradually increases to stronger compression in the ankle and arch regions for greater stability and comfort just where you need it. Increase blood circulation to the muscles while working out by reducing leg fatigue and effects of delayed onset muscle soreness in the days following strenuous exercise, allowing for improved athletic performance and faster recovery periods.

  • Use for cycling, basketball, softball, baseball, football, soccer, volleyball, running, rugby, and other high intensity sports training.
  • Helps to alleviate swelling and inflammation, making it a great choice for sports activities, travel or everyday use
  • Use on long flights to reduce uncomfortable leg and ankle swelling, cramping and minor variscosities
  • Made with closed toes, reinforced heels and a non-binding knit-in band to keep securely in place
  • Moisture-wicking fabric helps keep you cool, dry and ready for all-day action
  • These are black socks with an accent color. Accents available in Red, Green or Blue.

Interested in the benefits of compression for athletes? Check out our page on compression!

The post No Varix Athletic Compression Socks appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Athletic Leg Compression Sleeves
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
No Varix Sports Training Graduated Compression Leg Sleeves deliver dual, pin-point compression to the front and back of the legs to increase blood circulation and provide muscle support during athletic training, recovery, or travel.

The post Athletic Leg Compression Sleeves appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The sleeves feature seamless gradient compression which provides wide ribbing in the front for shin support and tight ribbing in the back for calf support. Graduated ribbed compression gives you maximum support where you need it, and lighter compression where you don’t – resulting in a more comfortable fit. The compression sleeve fabric is breathable and moisture wicking, allowing the garment and athlete to stay cool, dry and light during exertion.

  • Specially designed for increased muscle support during sports training for enhanced athletic performance.
  • Use for cycling, basketball, softball, baseball, football, soccer, volleyball, running, rugby, and other high intensity sports training.
  • A great choice for sports activities, travel or everyday use. Use on long flights to reduce uncomfortable leg and ankle swelling, cramping and minor variscosities
  • Pulls moisture from your skin, dries quickly and helps regulates skin temperature. Moisture-wicking fabric helps keep you cool, dry and ready for all-day action.

Learn more about the benefits of compression.

The post Athletic Leg Compression Sleeves appeared first on AT Surgical.
